title: Moved array to array.xml
message:
Moved array to array.xml

moved the array with the values for password strength to array.xml, so those values can be translated, too

title: Changed hardcoded string
message:
Changed hardcoded string

changed the hardcoded string at line 182, now it's read from strings.xml (and added the translation for the string to strings-de.xml); there is still a problem since this approach doesn't allow to correctly translate the sentence to languages where Archive and Trash require being preceded by different articles depending on the word (like Italian) or where Archive and Trash are of different genders and require the adjective for "empty" to be concordant with the gender. I thought of two possible ways to solve this:
--use a different string for each folder; this would require some change in the code in order to retrieve the correct string at runtime; I can do this if you're ok with it
--use only the word "empty" without naming the folder

title: FIX: App crashes when password is null or tags are retrieved from parcel FIXES #25
message:
FIX: App crashes when password is null or tags are retrieved from parcel FIXES #25

- Check for null password and navigate to PasswordActivity if true. When app permissions are
revoked manually, the password in the memory is lost and the app crashes.

- Pass note to NoteContent.FromString. Tags are passed to NoteContent instead of note that cause
the tags to be null when read from parcel.

title: Merge branch 'release/v0.7.0'
message:
Merge branch 'release/v0.7.0'

Several changes to codebase and features

* Partial porting to fragment
* Note List Views - Simple List View
* Note Contents - Generic/Card/Login
* Tagging of notes
* Use Loader for loading all notes
* Roughly NIST based password strength meter
* Several UI changes
* Several bug fixes for stability and performance

Earlier it looked good on N7 but had lot of padding on N4.

message: Error log messages instead of debug

title: Merge tag 'v0.7.0' into develop
message:
Merge tag 'v0.7.0' into develop

v0.7.0

This is a private release not meant to be published to public.

Several new features introduces which are supposed to be
available only to premium users. However these features
are still unlocked in this release.

Some new features -

    * Note List Views - Simple List View
    * Note Contents - Generic/Card/Login
    * Tagging of notes
    * Roughly NIST based password strength meter
    * Several UI changes
    * Several bug fixes for stability and performance

after the activity has created and prepared the actionmenu

note we refresh icons in action bar

in adapter instead of View.

  database.
